article_title: Baltimore offers glimpse of broader opioid treatment planned in R.I.

article_metadata.description: Collaborative program also offers the two other federally approved addiction medications, buprenorphine and naltrexone, and a full complement of mandatory addiction counseling and group classes.
article_metadata.author: Christine Vestal Stateline.org
